name: iframe-translator
description: Translate text for free in the browser with iframe shenanigans
author: Kento Nishi

scripts.build: tsc index.ts --target es6 --declaration && mkdir -p dist && cp index.js dist/index.js && cp index.d.ts ../index.d.ts && cp package.json dist/package.json && cp ../README.md dist/README.md && cp ../LICENSE dist/LICENSE
